ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Automatic Weather Station (AWS) at the Manado observatory
ResourceHeader.Description: The Automatic Weather Station (AWS) (MAWS201; Vaisala) at Manado in North Suraesi, Indonesia (1.55N, 124.39E, 90m MSL) measures surface precipitation, temperature, relative humidity, pressure and wind direction and speed. This instrument has been operated by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere (RISH), Kyoto University since January 15, 2009. Detailed description of this AWS can be found in the document (http://www.vaisala.com/Vaisala%20Documents/Brochures%20and%20Datasheets/MAWS201-Datasheet-B211006EN-A-LoRes.pdf).
